Reason: The configuration option 'periodic_commitlog_sync_lag_block_in_ms' is performance-sensitive. The reason for this classification is that the 'blockWhenSyncLagsNanos' variable is calculated based on the value of 'DatabaseDescriptor.getPeriodicCommitLogSyncBlock()', which directly affects the waiting time in the 'maybeWaitForSync' method. This waiting time can have a significant impact on the performance of the system, as it determines when the commit log sync operation will be triggered. Therefore, any changes in the value of 'periodic_commitlog_sync_lag_block_in_ms' can lead to notable performance variations at the system level.
